Jogo bom demais, porém ta cheio de Bug. Recentemente atualizou, porém os bugs não cessaram ainda. 

- Entrar no Lobby e depois ser kickado do nada.
- Depois da nova atualização, começou a dar Lag, coisa que comigo não tinha dado.
- Já aconteceu de um sobrevivente ficar no Gancho Forever comigo.
- Já aconteceu de eu ficar preso depois de sair do Gancho.
- Várias vezes o jogo desconectou comigo, quase pra vencer a partida.
- Algumas vezes aconteceu de não conseguir mais pegar os sobreviventes que estavam no chão, em duas, eles conseguiram escapar.

Desenvolvedores, bora corrigir esses bugs porque ta foda isso.

Fun idea it really is. I've always liked games where one guy plays as the monster. However, The game play is relient on way to much cheese. people just hopping back and fourth through windows to abuse that you go through it faster than the killer really takes you out of the world the game tries to build. Plus in a game like this where you get perks and level progression for individual characters there needs to be some sort of matchmaking system. New people just get shit on by people with 500 hours and super rare perks.

脑子是个好东西，游戏的平衡不是你拿个手电就去戏耍屠夫的。

原来一个板子无脑绕三圈，杀戮起来拉板子转点，如果是走地屠夫，如果有手电，他一个人能玩到开门，没手电砍倒最少掉3台机，

上个版本对人类拉板有所削弱，少绕一圈，但是对护士和兔子也一直在削弱，电锯需要高配，代价较大。

这个版本削弱了弹射起步，增强了怂皇技能，略为增强了两个走地屠夫，还有没人玩的李奶奶，顺便削弱了秒举

有些人只想着自己拿个手电跟屠夫皮，从来没想过走地屠夫玩的是有多心累，每个板子都要去藏红光，倒车，套路。玩人的是个傻子都知道，见个板子绕两圈，板子下面等一下，看看屠夫头铁不，头铁拉板子走了，头不铁下个板子绕3圈。

最后，希望刷差评的带点脑子

制作组能不能增强一波走地

At first it was a fantastick game and yes there were bugs here and there but it was playable and glitches and crashes didn't apear to be as bad. I do apreciate that the devepolers are adding new featurs and truing to "improve" the game, but honestly the amount of crashes after the introduction of survive with friends, is too DAMN HIGHT! whar is the point of ranking system if you join the game and it crashes after the load up causing you to derank.  On top of everything there is no support team. you try to contact them and they (if they even exist) completely ignore you.  friend of mine can't even load the game. we triyed everything that was sugested and then some. as soon as the game menue loads the game just crashes and you end up on your window screen. And what we got from support about this issue was..... nothing, because they havent respondet at all. I wish that the development team would of focused little more on making game more stable and little less on adding few map changes and opoutfits. 

My apologies for butchering english.

This game is fun, especially with friends. 

There are a ton of bugs however, and the matchmaking isn't all that great. There is tons of content that is planned, not as much actually in the game yet. 

That kinda makes sense, because it's being ported to PS4 later.

But if that's the case, this game should really be in early access, because of the lack of polish at the current moment. 

It doesn't feel like a 1.0v game, but given time it can be greatly improved.

I trust the developers to develop this game further even at it's current state, but it should really be early access.

If your idea of competetive balance involves making your customer physically ill, YOU HAVE FAILED AS A GAME DESIGNER!

The game's FOV is locked to an absurdly low level, around 50 or so, and if you decide to play as the killer be ready for lots of shaky-cam! Combined with how dark the game is, and all but the most stalwart players will be motion sick within an hour.

Not to mention that the options menu is a joke. There is no way to turn individual features on or off, such as DOF, you can't assign a specific resolution, there is no AA whatsoever, and the game runs terribly! (Using a 390 8GB and getting 30-40 FPS on ultra... in 720p.)

Avoid! Avoid! Avoid!

This game is awesome. Being able to survive with friends or kill your friends, the game has an addictive leveling and ranking system with a mix of horror that makes it a game you can play for hours on end. I would reccomend that you buy it with friends however, unless you are just looking to be a killer because surviving without friends can be boring but its a good way to get online friends.

No ai, poor tutorials, very little chance to start playing without pissing everyone off.

I can't recommend this game, because I don't feel as though I'll ever have the chance to start playing, without ruining it for everyone else. It feels like I'm trying to enter a club and I don't meet the proper requirements when I start. This would be less of a bother if I had ai bots to fail in front of, a proper tutorial, or at the very least: a method of organizing players by their ranks, so I'd fail as much as everyone else. This game has none of the above. (IF it does have a method of organizing players by rank, then it seems awfully strange how everyone is already at their top ranks and nobody seems to be new to this at all, considering how I was just dropped in the middle of expirienced players. Twice.)

 As a killer: you can't just kill a survivor. You'll have to attack the survivor, then drag his/her body to a meat hook, HOPING that another survivor didn't break it, all within a certain period of time. I've been told that you CAN kill a downed survivor if you can find a "memento", which I find to be completely rediculous. If you're a killer, aren't you supposed to.....well, kill people!?

As a survivor: fixing a generator requires a quicktime action. Because the developers will not have mentioned this ANYWHERE, you will most likely fail the first time you touch a generator and either get slaughered because of it, or hurt your team's chances at survival because of it.

This isn't tf2, pd2, csgo etc. where you can fail in front of ai bots or recieve proper tutorials. This is a polished, yet unfinished game that you have to pay for, in more than one way. It MIGHT improve over time, but as of now, I wouldn't recommend you play it at all, unless if you know 2 - 3 other people who also play it.

If you want a good slasher game, where you play as the killer: I'd recommend "Party Hard". It's storyline is decent, most of your attacks are stealthy and strategic, and the best part: You aren't expected to know what you're doing, before you're supposed to know what you're doing.
Очень здорово, надеюсь незабросят игру.

FIRE THE FUCKING DEVELOPERS. FUCK THIS NEW UPDATE.

I love the game. It is a ton of fun to play the Wraith. Saying that, I also have to mention that I have lost rank three times now for getting stuck while trying to pick someone up. The other survivors even try shining a flashlight at me after noticing that I am stuck, and I continue to sit there until I just leave the game.

EDIT: I figured I would give it a second try. I have had to leave a game twice today due to getting stuck while trying to pick someone off the ground. I also just had to leave the game because I had hung two people, and the "entity" did not take them into the sky. I am getting very disheartened with how this game is performing currently. Simple parts of the game that should have been solved before it even got released are becoming a common issue with my playing of this game. I have the feeling of buyer's remorse due to the lack of faith I have in this game going further.

It is now 02-16-2017. A new patch has come out that will make killer more fun to play. I try to log on to the game, and it says launch error. I try to re-open it through steam, and I get the same response. After opening and closing the game multiple times, I have almost given up. The game is fun. It also ruins my nights. If I am in a surviving mood, I have to wait until I hopefully get someone that isn't lagging, and not a bot. If I want to kill, I have to hope that all 4 survivors get in the game, so that I don't have to "be a good sport" and let everyone pip. Steadily losing faith. The game is a great concept. I cannot recommend a friend buy it with everything that I have experienced with it.

07/08/2017 update -- I have tried updating drivers, installing the new windows update, went through the command prompt on my computer to fix corrupted files, and again to try to fix the easyanticheat error I was receiving. Fuck this game. Fuck the developers. I have tried e-mailing for help and received none. New update? DLC. Bug fixes? Next time. It has been nearly a year since I have played this game, and I still cannot. Fun game, and I am trying to remain patient with the hopes that a fix will eventually come. I now consider my library on steam one less because of this game. I've put 30$ into this game, put +300$ into updating my graphics card and power supply JUST TO PLAY THIS GAME, and now I cannot. If anyone asks me about this game, I will give severe harshness towards it. Last, and without regret, fuck this game.

Little hard but funny game. If you play well and long time, you can notice how much killer is poor... :))

But so many bugs and if CHINESE killer(server host) makes fu**ing laggy.

Do you want a game that is fun or frustrating? Well if frustrating is what you're looking for, this is your game. The development team is apathetic at best about this game. They want all the glory and fun of making a game without putting in the hardwork that it takes to be actually successful.

Pros:
` Can play with friends
` Competitive keeps things interesting
` Has a great premise

Cons:
` Game crashes constantly
` Devs WILL NOT make necessary changes that the game needs
` Balance changes are MORE important than a functioning game
` Overall clunkiness in mechanics for both killer and survivors
` Matchmaking breaks on a regular (Searching and researching can take almost an hour for one game)

TL:DR 
Please DO NOT buy this game, you will be rewarding laziness and greediness at its purest form. Honestly feels like a get rich quick scam by the developers.

[h1] Not a huge fan of this game. [/h1]

[olist]
[*][b] Game is not incredibly fun to play alone. [/b] Unless you have a set of 4 friends plus yourself to play with, you may find this game is considerably less enjoyable. If you do have a group of 5 including yourself, you may still have a problem with the game.
[*][b] The posted recommended specs are inaccurate. [/b] Typically the recommend specs are specs that allow you to play the game on non-minumum settings and not experience any skipping or framerate loss. The computer I used to play this game met or exceeded the [b] recommended [/b] specs and still experienced a low framerate at medium settings. Therefore I had to drop them to minimum settings - [b] only to experience the exact same framerate despite the settings change, [/b] Very difficult to play under such poor conditions.
[*][b] Tutorial is very bare-bones and not in-depth. [/b] The tutorial will tell you how to play each 'hunter' or 'hunted'. It will tell you each skill they each have, etc. However the skill web and the itemization functions are [b] not [/b] explained well at all. I added several "items" and "add-ons" to my hunter to find them missing immediately after a match, and since no tutorial expalined how they work, I was forced to search the internet to find out that those two portions of the loadout are consumable. Nowhere does the game state how they work.

Overall, I found this game to be below-grade, and cannot currently recommend it to [i] anyone. [/i]

Un jeu multijoueur asymétrique (1 tueur contre 4 survivants) très fun ! 

Il comporte deux camps au gameplay radicalement différent : 

Jouez un survivant et tentez de vous échapper en réalisant des objectifs et en aidant votre équipe ...
Il est impossible de se débarrasser du tueur, mais on l'entend arriver et il est possible de se cacher, de le ralentir, de le gêner, de l'appâter ailleurs, et de sauver ses camarades du redouté crochet ...

Ou bien incarnez un tueur, traquez et tuez les tous, petit à petit ... 
Vous êtes seul contre 4. Il faudra être efficace, intimider les survivants, deviner leurs futures actions, savoir lesquels cibler en priorité, être attentif aux alertes, ne pas se laisser attirer dans une zone éloignée ...

Il est primordial d'avoir un plan avant même de lancer sa partie. Cela passe par l'équipement (médikit, lampe torche, amélioration d'armes) et les compétences (traque, déplacement, soin, bonus ...)

Les parties sont classées mais le niveau général est assez accessible. On peut jouer entre amis avec l'option "survive with friends". A noter que ces joueurs là sont plus efficaces, car ils sont les seuls à pouvoir communiquer entre eux vocalement (avec un logiciel externe de type Discord).

Tueurs, soyez prévenus : les "nerfs" vous concerneront principalement. Mais sincèrement ça pourrait être pire. 

En bref, un jeu au concept amusant et original, et tenu à jour régulièrement. 


PS : 
Si vous voulez un aperçu du tueur, le streamer tru3ta1ent est vraiment bon et joue tous les tueurs, en plus d'être pédagogue (mais anglophone).

Si vous voulez jouer survivant voici un conseil (en 3 mots) qui vous rendra automatiquement meilleur que 50% des joueurs : chaque seconde compte. Faites toujours quelque chose (ne jouez à cache-cache quand vous n'êtes pas poursuivi c'est inutile :p) et évitez de vous soigner vous-même c'est trop chronophage.
Good game!

从制作组不断更新以及推出新内容以及迎合中国玩家的态度就应该给此款游戏一个好评
————————————————————————————————————
从发售开始玩，现在已经玩了500多小时了，基本都直播玩的鬼。
良心游戏，官方一直在改动，现在又更新了官方中文，特此来写第一份认真的评测：

最早开始游戏里人类强推是没有惩罚的，玩鬼没分，玩人为了分而玩。
所以官方改动了强退处罚机制，并且开启了组队系统，让人类加更团结，不是为了分而奋斗，为了生存奋斗，玩游戏应该有代入感才能使游戏更加有趣。

这次大型更新了免费的新地图和免费的人物服装，我觉得大家不能要求太高，对于一个小作坊便宜价格的游戏 制作商已经很良心了【简直是物超所值】。
这个游戏就不应该有无敌房的设定，这是个猫鼠游戏，活生生给你们玩成跑酷游戏，改了无敌点还嫌弃没法玩，难道鬼一点威慑感都没有了吗？
讲道理 这次更新你们嫌弃没法玩人，平地追人我都追丢过，看是什么技能搭配而已，现在的人都是标配 猫+破坏者+自摸+起步，一出事就是无敌点，一出事就是无敌点！不绕个2.3分钟都套路不到。
所以这次更新无敌点改的很贴心，让恐怖游戏渐渐有氛围起来。觉得杰克帕克的钢铁意志和通用羽毛技能这类躲藏技能会慢慢变热门。

现在官方唯一要管管的就是修改数据作弊者和加速辅助器作弊者这种不公平竞争【虽然游戏里这些人并不多.不过也请大家steam举报ID，亲测有效】
希望官方继续关注这个游戏，黎明杀机很受欢迎，请不要放弃它，买了原声带表示对制作组的支持。

没有买黎明杀机的同学，
如果你想体验那种藏起来时听到电锯响动和铃铛响的绝望感，
亦或者那种在激昂的音乐追逐猎物一刀砍下的快感，
那就买下它！
免费的地图更新！
免费的服装更新！
超棒的新优化！
自带中文语言！
耐玩好玩！
官方重视！
可以和朋友开黑！
超亲民的价格！
心动了？那就买下它！
铃哥向你保证你不会后悔！够你玩个假期回来还想玩！

So after putting some more hours into the game, I can say that it's slowly getting better than what this game USED to be. I haven't run into anyone using infinites, teammates are actually teammates, and killers camp less than they used to. However, there's still a slew of problems with the game (killers dodging matches, balance issues, the matchmaking in general), but they're being addressed as quickly as the devs can manage, and after watching a couple of their streams I noticed that (gasp!) the devs were already WELL aware of the problems, and were working on solutions while putting out new content. After playing quite a lot of survivor, and a bit of killer, I couldn't find a major source of frustration, other than myself making stupid decisions. So I reverse my negative review, and change it to positive because hey, at least these people actually seem to CARE about their game.

tl;dr: It's getting there, guys. In my case, I can actually have fun again.
For just 17.99 you and a friend (or you on your own) can play ready up sim 2016. FIX GOD DAMN MATCHING MAKING AND ADD A QUEUE SYSTEM!!!!

DISCLAIMER : I wrote this review when I only had about 50 hours and these we're my first thoughts on the game.

I may not have many hours on this game,but here are my first impressions : 
Good:
-Its a really fun and thrilling game,everytime I play I always feel tense because I dont know what may happen next
-Chases are fun,as both killer and survivor,it depends on skill (does not include infinite juke spots)
-Variety of perks to choose from
-It's that kind of game that gets repetitive but comes out differently every time
-Every game is thrilling with friends or even alone!

Bad:
-People argue about infinite juke spots,bad for killers,good for suvivors,and so on
-Camper as a killer,there is no game without a god damn camper
-Bugs (what a surprise) in my opinion the game came out too early and it should have been released later on the year or even next year
-Already hackers,and talking about hackers,some people change the save files so they get the best lvl 3 prestige Dwight out there!

But what about friendly killers? You decide if its bad or good

For now I dont really reccomend it because of the bugs and campers in the game,but no one is stopping ya!

Updates! (My thoughts) : 

1st Update : Most of the infinites have been taken out of the game and I think it is fair for that to happen. Why? Because for me,as survivor or killer it gets boring to just abuse infinites or chase 1 guy the whole match.

2nd Update,Nurse,Nea and New Map! : To be honest,I got very hyped about the new killer and survivor. I wanted to see how they look and what the offer us,what perks they have,etc.. People say the Nurse is pretty broken and Nea is the new ''Dwight''. I totally agree with these statements but I dont think the Nurse is ''broken''. Yes,it has powerful perks and can teleport but that doesn't mean you cant escape her or survive against her.The new map is gigantic and has loads of pallets,it reminds me of autohaven.

3rd Update,Nerfing survivors and buffing killers? : Now as survivor you get less points for certain actions and as killer you get more points for other actions.I believe you only get 500 points if you sabotage a hook,250 for sabotaging a trap. As HillBilly,you get more points for chainsawing people,I believe it is 850.I forgot something,now you cant see the ranks of other people in lobbies for both killer and survivor.Atleast now many killers dont dodge lobbies :p.

Notes :

Since the last few updates there has been some ''problems'' and ''bugs'' such as taking forever to join a game as survivor or sometimes if a killer grabs you on the ground you might levitate in the air.Another bug that isnt new and that I would like for it to be fixed is that sometimes in the end of a match at the scoreboard I can see the results of the last match instead of the match I just played.
Баланса нет и не предвидится. Если у вас вместо рук раковые клешни и вы хотите побеждать во всех мультиплеерных раундах, смело играйте за маньяка

アプデ毎にMapを改悪し、キラー有利な調整ばかりしています。
その度にサバイバーをやるのが楽しくなくなってきました。
一部の嵌め技と呼ばれる窓や石垣の飛び越え安全地帯があったため、
キラー側がイライラして文句をつけた結果かと思われます。
サバイバー側からすると、キラーの足の方が速いため一度目をつけられると
ほぼ逃げ切れないようなMapばかりになりました。
見通しを良くし、遮蔽物を少なくし、間隔を開けたりしてきた結果、
逆をついて隠れるなどのドキドキする駆け引きが減ったように思います。
特に今回（06/7/27）のMap調整で、袋小路のような場所や
引っかかって追いつかれる要因になるような箇所が大幅に増えました。
安全地帯もほぼ潰されたため、サバイバーが上手いキラーから
逃げ切るのが非常に難しくなり、やってて面白くない状態です。
また違った逃げ方などがあるかもしれませんが、今回Mapに大幅な修正が
されたため、また一からMapを覚えて楽しむという気には正直なれません。

Okay after a month playing this game (I've had for 3 years) and either disconnecting or having the game freeze 10 plus times a day, i will never reccommend.

Cons:
Killer takes nearly 0 skill due to absurdly overpowered perks, killers at high ranks also have the worst internet in the game ( huge surprise)
Survivors will farm other survivors rather than being productive towards their TEAM GOAL. 
Overall teamwork is not promoted within the game, little to no communication allowed unless within a premade party, pointing and waving are the only emotes (others were supposed to be added, never occured). 

Pros: 
you can run around to get face camped
you do a gen to get face camped
you can dc every time a killer drops a survivor pudding as a personal FU
there really are no pros to this game it feels

Literally just dont buy this game unless you are going to play with friends, its more frustrating than it is a positive experience
